definition: (bird species of China) lesser yellowlegs (Tringa flavipes)
yellow bicycle (by Ofo bicycle sharing company)

sentences.english: Xiao Huang was stricken by AIDS when he had blood transfusion in the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 小黄在医院输血后，不幸感染了艾滋病毒。

sentences.english: It seems Miss Daisy has many problems.
sentences.chinese: 小黄好像有不少问题啊。

sentences.english: Huang likes to travel as a backpacker.
sentences.chinese: 小黄喜欢背包徒步旅行。

sentences.english: Xiaohuang had been waiting for Liqing for an hour by the time she arrived.
sentences.chinese: 当丽卿到达时，小黄已等待她一个小时了。

sentences.english: Slowly, but surely a layer of dust keeps building up on Miss Daisy and my clothes.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢地，小黄和我的衣服上就积起了一层灰土。

definition: Xiaojin county (Tibetan: btsan lha rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan
(pet name for a baby or small child)
(slang) novice/greenhorn/fool/idiot/abbr. for 小白臉|小白脸[xiao3 bai2 lian3], pretty boy
(coll.) father's older brother/uncle/term of respect for older man
maternal aunt/step-mother/childcare worker/nursemaid/woman of similar age to one's parents (term of address used by child)/CL:個|个[ge4]
